events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our technology team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your background in software development.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your case to guide you through the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, and we discussed your software engineering experience and project highlights.
Thank you for promptly answering our questions during the screening. Your enthusiasm for the software engineer role is greatly appreciated.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the Software Engineer position on May 10th, where you will discuss coding challenges and system design.
